p: Tick questing activity, reproduction, and survival, depend on several factors that, in turn, have a direct impact on tick distribution and abundance ( Estrada-Peña et al., 2013, Lauterbach et al., 2013, Léger et al., 2013, Medlock et al., 2013, Jore et al., 2014). These include vegetation coverage, host availability, moisture and temperature conditions, photoperiod, and human activities. A very good account on the ecological physiology of ticks may found elsewhere ( Randolph, 2009).
